description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0277 (Appointment Type Codes)

display.value: Routine schedule request type - default if not valued

definition.value: Routine schedule request type - default if not valued

display.value: A request for a tentative (e.g., “penciled in”) appointment

definition.value: A request for a tentative (e.g., “penciled in”) appointment

display.value: A request to add a completed appointment, used to maintain records of completed appointments that did not appear in the schedule (e.g., STAT, walk-in, etc.)

definition.value: A request to add a completed appointment, used to maintain records of completed appointments that did not appear in the schedule (e.g., STAT, walk-in, etc.)
